name: prison-bottle
effect: Transforms Hoopa into its Unbound form for up to three days.
short_effect: Transforms Hoopa into its Unbound form for up to three days.

flavor_text.sun_moon: A bottle believed to have been used to seal away the power of a certain Pokémon long, long ago.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: A bottle believed to have been used to seal away the power of a certain Pokémon long, long ago.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: A bottle believed to have been used to seal away the power of a certain Pokémon long, long ago.
